Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp17
Package it.polimi.ingsw.connection

Class ConnectionHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.connection.ConnectionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMIConnectionHandler, SocketConnectionHandler
public abstract class ConnectionHandler extends Object implements Serializable
ConnectionHandler class used to handle the different types of connection
